Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers

Class TicketController

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.controllers.TicketController
public class TicketController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling operations related to tickets.

      Returns:

    • createManualTicket

      public OperationResult createManualTicket(UUID orderId, ArrayList<Tuple<Product,Integer>> products, String description, TicketCause cause)
      Creates a manual ticket for a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The UUID of the order for which to create a manual ticket.
      products - The list of products and quantities involved in the ticket.
      description - The description of the issue leading to the ticket creation.
      cause - The cause of the ticket (e.g., damaged, wrong item).
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • createReturnTicket

      public OperationResult createReturnTicket(UUID orderId, ArrayList<Tuple<Product,Integer>> products, TicketCause cause)
      Creates a return ticket for a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The UUID of the order for which to create a return ticket.
      products - The list of products and quantities involved in the return ticket.
      cause - The cause of the return ticket (e.g., damaged, wrong item).
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • startExchangeProcess

      public OperationResult startExchangeProcess(UUID orderId, ArrayList<Tuple<Product,Integer>> products, TicketCause cause)
      Initiates the process of exchanging products for a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The UUID of the order for which to initiate the exchange process.
      products - The list of products and quantities involved in the exchange process.
      cause - The cause of the exchange process (e.g., damaged, wrong item).
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • cancelExchangeProcess

      Retrieves the exchange cart containing products selected for an ongoing exchange process.

    • changeTicketToReturnAndReplace

      public OperationResult changeTicketToReturnAndReplace(UUID ticketId, String solution, String shippingCompany, String trackingNumber)
      Changes a ticket to indicate both return and replacement.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket to modify.
      solution - The proposed solution for the ticket.
      shippingCompany - The shipping company used for the return and replacement.
      trackingNumber - The tracking number of the return and replacement shipment.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • changeTicketToReturnWithoutReplace

      public OperationResult changeTicketToReturnWithoutReplace(UUID ticketId, String solution, String shippingCompany, String trackingNumber)
      Changes a ticket to indicate return without replacement.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket to modify.
      solution - The proposed solution for the ticket.
      shippingCompany - The shipping company used for the return.
      trackingNumber - The tracking number of the return shipment.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • createReplacementShipment

      public OperationResult createReplacementShipment(UUID ticketId, String description, String trackingNumber, LocalDate deliveryDate, String shippingCompany)
      Creates a replacement shipment for a ticket.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket for which to create a replacement shipment.
      description - The description of the replacement product(s).
      trackingNumber - The tracking number of the replacement shipment.
      deliveryDate - The delivery date of the replacement shipment.
      shippingCompany - The shipping company used for the replacement shipment.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).
